abesinhame dinawala uthurumada ha wayambaa pradeshawala pawathina niyangaya nisa waga hani siduwana gowi janathawa sandaha ha wagawa athharimata siduwu janathawa sandaha sudusu sahana salasimata warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha wisin amathya mandala sandeshayak idiripath kirimata yayi.niyangaya nisa prashna athiwi aththe alahara ha girithale pradeshawalatath kurunagala bathalagoda pradeshayatath bawa pawasana amathiwaraya ee wagakaruwanta jala hingayata muhuna pamata siduwi aththe adala pradeshawala kanna raswimwaladi gath thindu thirana ee wagakaruwan wisin kadakirima nisa bawa da nimal siripala amathiwaraya kiya.ee samangama kothmale, kalawawa, kandalama, bathalagoda, nachchaduwa, polonnaruwa yana pradeshawalata pasugiya mayi masaye labi aththe samanyayen labiya yuthu wassen siyayata 10 - 15 k pamana bawath amathiwaraya kiya.me anuwa me uthurumada wayambaa palathwala me dinawala pawathina jala hingayata pradhana hethuwa wassa aduwima ha washpi bhawanaya wadiwima ha polawa rathwima bawa da ronmada nisa me jalashawalata kisima prashnayak nathi bawa da amathiwaraya mehidi awadharanaya kaleya.kese wuwath jalashawala thibena ronmada iwath kirima aarthika washayen labhadayi nowana bawath niyangayen pida windina ayata sahana salasimata wishesha jala kalamanakarana wada satahan rasak kriyathmaka bawath, me pilibandawa pawathi madhya hamuwakadi warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathyanshaye lekam ayiwan da silwa mahatha pawasiya.samahara mahawali pradeshawala gowiyan balen wagakara athath awasanayedi siduwiya haki waga hani pramanaya siyayata 9 k pamana bawa da mahawali adhikariya pawasayi.yala kannayedi hektayara 292444 ka mahawali idam waga karana athara in hektayara 26298 k pamana waga hani wiya haki bawa da nimal siripala amathiwaraya kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
